entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
